column5: Riverfront property! This 2 bedroom/2 bath condo sleeps 6 guests comfortably. This unit includes 1 King bed, 1 Queen bed and 1 sleeper bed. Each rental is fully furnished and includes towels, linens, cookware, washer, dryer, TV's and more! With the Comal River steps away, guests can enjoy fishing, tubing, swimming or a peaceful stroll.
column8: Remarkable views along the Comal River! - Comal River 313
